title: Mobile Microlearning Course on Laryngeal Anatomy

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic biology and human anatomy
context.additional_context: Applying customized 3D visualization content and ARCS motivation theory-based CAI design for adult learners aged 40+

learning_goals: Over 85% of learners can accurately identify the location of vocal cords and thyroid cartilage using a 3D laryngeal structure module
After CAI learning, an average satisfaction score of 4.0/5.0 or higher is achieved in the IMMS motivation survey
Over 90% of learners submit creative case reports linking laryngeal structure and function in project-based assessments
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
